verses.verse: In that day <S%H3117><s%> you will say, <S%H559><s%> "I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh; for though you were angry <S%H599><s%> with me, <S%H639><s%> your anger has turned away <S%H7725><s%> and you comfort me. <S%H5162><s%>

Behold, <S%H410><s%> God is my salvation. <S%H3444><s%> I will trust, <S%H982><s%> and will not be afraid; <S%H6342><s%> for Yah, <S%H3050><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song; <S%H2176><s%> and he has become my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"
Therefore with joy <S%H8342><s%> you will draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the wells <S%H4599><s%> of salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> you will say, <S%H559><s%> "Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Call <S%H7121><s%> on his name. <S%H8034><s%> Declare <S%H3045><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%> Proclaim <S%H2142><s%> that his name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted! <S%H7682><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he has done <S%H6213><s%> excellent things! <S%H1348><s%> Let this be known <S%H3045><s%> in all the earth! <S%H776><s%>

Cry aloud <S%H6670><s%> and shout, <S%H7442><s%> you inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in the midst of you! <S%H7130><s%>"
